headline: AI Data Centers Continue To Fuel Builders. These Stocks Are In Buy Zones.
summary: Jacobs Solutions was in buy range from a 152.40 buy point.  Dallas-based Jacobs has a 92 IBD Composite Rating.  In its Aug. 5 earnings report, the company said its data center backlog is growing strongly.

headline: What Jacobs Solutions (J)'s Launch of Flood Platform Means for Shareholders
summary: Jacobs Solutions recently launched Flood Platform, a cloud-hosted, subscription-based hub designed to unify and streamline advanced flood modeling for critical infrastructure programs globally. This innovative platform, now commercially available after supporting major real-world projects, harnesses AI, cloud integration, and data management to help clients manage and interpret vast flood-related data more efficiently. We'll look at how this move into subscription-based digital solutions...

headline: Jacobs Solutions Launches AI Flood Platform: Assessing Valuation After Latest Push Into Digital Infrastructure
summary: Jacobs Solutions (NYSE:J) has just launched Flood Platform, a new subscription-based cloud hub designed to unify and streamline flood modeling for clients around the world. The platform uses digital, AI, and data management tools. See our latest analysis for Jacobs Solutions. Flood Platform marks another data-driven push from Jacobs Solutions as the company rides a tidy 15.9% total shareholder return over the past year, reflecting strong long-term momentum. While the stock has advanced over...
